author: וואלה!
title: Ground News - “Women are finally getting the place they deserve. Not because we're doing us a favor, but because we've made great movies.” - Voila! culture
text:
Summary by וואלה! Between the Cannes Film Festival and the Oscars, Jewish actress Lia Drucker has become one of France's busiest stars. In an interview on the occasion of the release of her new film “Handlers of Affairs”, she talks about the growth of film directors in her country, the rise of anti-Semitism and her work with Nadav Lapid Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
